title: THAT PROBLEM IS ANNOYING!
body: I launched  new alpha client .exe AND NOTHING....  When i launched this client second time I   seen dark-blue window..... ONLY. 0 buttons, 0 screens. BIG ZERO. I was looking for solve. Nothing. (Just sorry for my bad english. I'm not from US. Just wrote here because on EUNE anybody dont gave me a solve.)

replies.body: Please try to use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), hopefully that will put everything in order. Maybe you are hitting a performance bug and its just slow to start up? Let us know!
I CANT EVEN PATCH MY LEAGUE OF LEGENDS! BECAUSE THIS FREAKING CLIENT.
I'm now reinstalling my League of Legends. SYL.
